question: In Arthurian legend, who threw Excalibur back into the Lake?
chain_of_thought_result: In Arthurian legend, it was Sir Bedivere who threw Excalibur back into the Lake. After King Arthur was mortally wounded in battle, he instructed Bedivere to return the sword to the Lady of the Lake. Initially, Bedivere hesitated and did not follow through with the task, but after Arthur insisted, he eventually threw Excalibur into the water, where it was received by the Lady of the Lake.
